# This file is autogenerated

title: signAuthorization
description: Overview of the signAuthorization method
slug: wallets/reference/account-kit/signer/classes/BaseAlchemySigner/signAuthorization
---

Signs an EIP-7702 Authorization and then returns the authorization with the signature.

## Import

```ts
import { BaseAlchemySigner } from "@account-kit/signer";
```

## Usage

```ts twoslash
import { AlchemyWebSigner } from "@account-kit/signer";

const signer = new AlchemyWebSigner({
  client: {
    connection: {
      rpcUrl: "/api/rpc",
    },
    iframeConfig: {
      iframeContainerId: "alchemy-signer-iframe-container",
    },
  },
});

const tx = await signer.signAuthorization({
  contractAddress: "0x1234123412341234123412341234123412341234",
  chainId: 1,
  nonce: 0,
});
```

## Parameters

### unsignedAuthorization

`AuthorizationRequest<number>`
the authorization to be signed

## Returns

`Promise<SignedAuthorization<number>> | undefined`
a promise that resolves to the authorization with the signature
